entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
